com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action

Class UserAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.engiweb.profilemanager.common.ruleengine.action.UserAction

  • public final class UserAction
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages entity 'User' which can be exploited by using Drools rules

      • moveOU

        public static void moveOU(DAO sql,
                          UserBean user,
                          OrgUnitBean orgUnitTO,
                          int type)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method changes the organization unit of a user
        Parameters:
        sql - Connection to DB
        user - The user you want to switch to new OU
        orgUnitTO - The new organization unit
        type - The change type:
        1. The roles shared by the 2 OUs are kept through the switch
        2. Only the default roles of the new OU are assigned to user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exception returned while switching OUs

      • addRoles

        public static void addRoles(DAO sql,
                            UserBean user,
                            GroupBean groupBean,
                            java.util.List<EntitlementBean> roles,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,AccountBean> accountList,
                            boolean checkIncomp,
                            boolean defaultRights)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method assigns one or more roles to a user with the possibility to choose an account for each account configuration related to the assignment
        Parameters:
        sql - Connection to DB
        user - The user to whom you want to assign roles
        groupBean - The user's organization unit
        roles - The roles that you want to assign to user
        accountList - Map with account configuration id as key and related accountBean as value
        checkIncomp - Incompatibility check
        defaultRights - boolean that allows to choose if assign the default rights or not
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any exception returned while assigning roles
